name: Hiragino Sans GB for PC
description:
Use Tahoma and Hiragino Sans GB for Simplified Chinese
Use Microsoft JhengHei for Traditional Chinese
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);


/* Simplified Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("cn"),
domain("265.com"),
domain("163.com"),
domain("21cn.com"),
domain("91.com"),
domain("92wy.com"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("blogbus.com"),
domain("caixin.com"),
domain("cc98.org"),
domain("chinahr.com"),
domain("chinaren.com"),
domain("cnbeta.com"),
domain("cngba.com"),
domain("csdn.com"),
domain("csdn.net"),
domain("dangdang.com"),
domain("douban.com"),
domain("douban.fm"),
domain("fanfou.com"),
domain("ftchinese.com"),
domain("google.cn"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("infoq.com"),
domain("infzm.com"),
domain("it168.com"),
domain("itpub.net"),
domain("kaixin.com"),
domain("kaixin001.com"),
domain("mop.com"),
domain("netease.com"),
domain("cn.nytimes.com"),
domain("oschina.net"),
domain("pinggu.org"),
domain("qq.com"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("sina.com"),
domain("sohu.com"),
domain("sogou.com"),
domain("tgbus.com"),
domain("tianya.com"),
domain("taobao.com"),
domain("tmall.com"),
domain("tom.com"),
domain("zh.wikipedia.org"),
domain("cn.wsj.com"),
domain("xinhuanet.com"),
domain("cn.yahoo.com"),
domain("ycool.com"),
domain("yihaodian.com"),
domain("youku.com"),
domain("zaobao.com"),
domain("zol.com.cn"),
domain("zhihu.com"),
domain("zju88.org"),
{
* { font-family: "Tahoma","Hiragino Sans GB W3",sans-serif !important; }
}


/* Traditional Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("tw"),
domain("discuss.com.hk"),
domain("facekoo.com"),
domain("on.cc"),
domain("mobile01.com"),
domain("uwants.com"),
domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.yahoo.com"),
domain("udn.com"),
regexp("zh-hk"),
regexp("zh-tw"),
{
* { font-family: "Microsoft JhengHei",sans-serif !important; }
}
